title: AI Chat Assistant Application - Frontend Implementation

requirements.summary: Create a conversational chat UI with message display, input field, send button, typing indicator, and clear conversation functionality
acceptanceCriteria: Chat thread displays all messages in chronological order with user messages right-aligned and AI messages left-aligned
Text input field and send button are visible at the bottom of the screen
A animated typing indicator appears while waiting for the backend response
A 'Clear conversation' button resets the chat history
The message thread auto-scrolls to the latest message

file_operations.description: Create the main chat interface component that displays the conversation thread with user messages right-aligned and AI messages left-aligned, includes an animated typing indicator that shows while awaiting backend responses, auto-scrolls to the latest message, and integrates the AI avatar icon. Reference the generated image at frontend/public/assets/generated/ai-avatar.dim_128x128.png for AI message bubbles.

Create a message bubble component that renders individual messages with role-based styling (user vs assistant), displays message content and timestamp, and applies the futuristic dark theme with neon accents and subtle glow effects on AI bubbles. Use the AI avatar icon at frontend/public/assets/generated/ai-avatar.dim_128x128.png for assistant messages.

Create a chat input component with a text input field and send button positioned at the bottom of the screen. Handle message submission on button click or Enter key press, disable input while waiting for responses, and apply dark theme styling with neon accent colors and subtle glow effects on focus.

Create an animated typing indicator component that displays three animated dots or a pulsing effect to show when the AI is processing a response. Apply the futuristic theme with neon green or cyan colors.

Create a custom hook that manages chat state including message history, loading state for the typing indicator, and backend communication. Expose functions to send messages via backend.sendMessage(), retrieve conversation history via backend.getConversationHistory(), and clear the conversation. Handle optimistic UI updates and error states.

Replace the default App component content with the ChatInterface component to display the AI chat assistant as the main application view. Remove any placeholder content and ensure the chat interface fills the viewport appropriately.

requirements.summary: Apply a sleek, futuristic dark-mode visual theme with deep charcoal/near-black backgrounds, neon green or cyan accents, clean typography, and subtle glowing effects
acceptanceCriteria: The app uses a dark background (near-black or deep charcoal) as the primary background color
AI message bubbles and interactive elements use a neon green or cyan accent color
Typography is clean and readable using a modern sans-serif or monospaced font
Subtle glow or gradient effects are applied to active inputs and AI response bubbles
The theme is applied consistently across all pages and components

file_operations.description: Update global styles to establish the futuristic dark theme base: set body background to deep charcoal or near-black (#0a0a0a or #111), define CSS custom properties for neon green/cyan accent colors (--neon-green: #00ff88, --neon-cyan: #00d9ff), add subtle glow effect utilities using box-shadow, and set default text color to light gray or white for readability.

Extend Tailwind configuration to support the futuristic theme: add custom colors for neon-green and neon-cyan accents, define custom box-shadow utilities for glow effects, configure a modern sans-serif or monospaced font family (e.g., 'Space Mono', 'Inter', or 'Roboto Mono'), and ensure dark mode utilities are available.
